msbt.message: Hey! Did you forget you were gonna drop by my place, ?I was waiting for you for so long!<10_4 /> I actually fell asleep
I invited you to my house, butI had something else to take care of, and I completely forgot!I'm so sorry, ! I'll make up for it next time, I promise!
Sorry, ! I totally spaced and forget you were coming over!I fell into a deep sleep after doing a bunch of weight trainingNext time I'll stay awake! I hope you can swing by some other time.
